page.title: 06BROOKLANDS
page.content: Brooklands is a place for old peole, for when they get too old to live on their own.Since Brooklands was built there have been one 100 or more people that have lived there. Brooklands was built in 1571.It was called Brooklands because there was a brook running through the front of the house. Brooklands is construeted of brick at the bottom and wattle and daub at the top.Brooklands has had only one disaster and it was a fire to the stable. The only crops they grow are kitchen things. The only animals they have is cats .The oldest resident is 94 and the youngest resident is 20 months.There are 16 bedrooms.There are no historical remains on the land. They own 5-6 acres.Brooklands has only had three extensions in 1894,1912,1984.
